pattern round 2 knit repeat these two rnds until 22 sts rem knit 6 sts from 1st dpn socks onto 3rd dpn graft toe using kitchener stitch leg cast on 60 sts and divide so that there are 29 sts on 1st dpn finishing 16 sts on 2nd dpn and 15 sts on 3rd dpn join for working in the weave in ends block as desired round being careful not to twist work in twisted rib for 1 special technique change to pinstripe pattern and work until sock measures 6 kitchener stitch from beginning or desired length ending with round 2 break yarn leaving a long tail and thread tail onto yarn needle holding both dpns in the left hand with one behind the other heel flap graft the sts together as follows insert the yarn needle through rearrange sts by dividing the 29 sts on 1st dpn onto two needles the first st on the front dpn as if to purl then through the first st and leave for instep transfer the 15 sts from 3rd dpn onto the on the back dpn as if to knit end of the 2nd dpn * insert the yarn needle through the first front st as if to knit and slide it off the dpn then through the second front st as if to purl work back and forth on the 31 heel sts as follows and leave it on insert the yarn needle through the first back st as row 1 ws sl 1 purl to last st sl 1 turn if to purl and slide it off then through the second back st as if to row 2 rs k1 * sl 1 k1 repeat from * to end turn knit and leave
